allow:
Bash(echo "-- Check showrooms data
SELECT 
  id, 
  name, 
  city,
  is_active,
  created_at
FROM showrooms
ORDER BY sort_order;

-- Check if RLS is enabled 
SELECT schemaname, tablename, rowsecurity 
FROM pg_tables 
WHERE tablename = ''showrooms'';

-- Check current policies
SELECT 
  schemaname, 
  tablename, 
  policyname,
  permissive,
  roles,
  cmd,
  qual
FROM pg_policies 
WHERE tablename = ''showrooms'';")
